title.rendered: Vote Best of the Best + Updates

content.rendered:
Vote Gottwals Books as Best of the Best

We have been nominated for the Macon Telegraph’s Best of the Best awards this year! Please take a minute to click on the links below and vote for Gottwals Books as Best Book Store. You can vote once per day, so vote for us multiple times between now and April 30th!

Warner Robins: http://bit.ly/2oIXmAT
Macon: http://bit.ly/2oROcUF

 

New Books

Check out our new stock sections in the stores! We carry new releases, books turning into movies or TV shows, and other popular titles.

 

New Melissa & Doug® Inventory

We now have new inventory from Melissa & Doug® stocked in all four Gottwals Books locations. Come and check the new items, including the Prehistoric Playground Activity Rug and Round the Savanna Safari Rug.

 

Easter Egg Hunt ’17

We had a crazy awesome time last weekend with our 2nd Annual Easter Egg Hunt at the Macon and Warner Robins stores! We estimate over 130 children showed up… we will definitely expand this event in the future. It’s proving to be a community favorite year after year!

 

Warehouse Update

The new Gottwals Books headquarters is coming together!
